'''Parvezravan Khwarrah''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Wonders of the World]]''. To complete this achievement, the player needs to find and restore 8 [[Primal Obelisk]]s in the [[Desert of Hadramaveth]] with [[Sacred Seal|Sacred Seals]].

==Trivia==
===Etymology===
* ''Khwarrah'' (or ''Xwarra'') is Middle Persian for "Glory of [Preceding Word],"<ref>Wikipedia, {{W|Ardashir-Khwarrah}}<!--Replace with better citation if found--></ref> making the achievement name translate to "Glory of [[Parvezravan]]."
